item.title: [317] Turn invisible when equiping custom? [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Invisibility is due to too many faces. If you can, either increase the polygon limit of your client, or decrease the amount of polygons in the model.

Read full topic
